name: Wild Dino VS Deadly Hunter 3D
description:
Wild Dino VS Deadly Hunter 3D

Hunting wild jungle animals is fun when one is a professional hunter as an amateur will endanger his life in trying to kill furious beasts.
This game is a brand new real hunting and sniper shooting experience which you might not been able to get in your real life.
Those who cannot risk their life hunting wild animals can enjoy real hunting experience by playing this game.
With access to powerful guns you will rely on your marksman skills to kill and trap animals including deer, wolf, bear, fox, zombie, triceraptor, raptor, etc
Animals feel jungle as their perfect sanctuary. When someone gets into it they take it as an invader.
Do you have what it takes to become a hunting legend?
The target of sniping running animals is a little challenging. So use your army sniper shooting skills to kill these animals before they attack or run away.
You have to select one animal at a time and then go into the levels which are five in number.

Game Features:

- Immersive hunting missions to complete
- Realistic 3D graphics and awesome sound effects
- Dozens of real world weapons and upgrades
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Game play is simple yet entertaining.
